allow:
Bash(python -c "
with open(''''irc.m'''', ''''r'''') as f:
    lines = f.readlines()
    for i in range(len(lines)-1):
        line = lines[i].rstrip()
        next_line = lines[i+1]
        # Check if line is commented and ends with ...
        if line.strip().startswith(''''%'''') and line.strip().endswith(''''...''''):
            # Check if next line is NOT commented
            if next_line.strip() and not next_line.strip().startswith(''''%''''):
                print(f''''Line {i+1}: {line}'''')
                print(f''''Line {i+2}: {next_line.rstrip()}'''')
                print()
")
